title: MD
biography: Venky Mama is a 2019 Indian Telugu-language action comedy film directed by Bobby Kolli. It stars Venkatesh, Naga Chaitanya, Raashii Khanna, and Payal Rajput in the lead roles, while Nassar, Prakash Raj, and Rao Ramesh play supporting roles. The film was produced by D. Suresh Babu of Suresh Productions and T. G. Vishwa Prasad of People Media Factory, with music composed by Thaman.
aiSummary: Venkatesh S.Critical Care is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 2 at Sepsis protocols (Member). Has been published in BMJ case reports, BMJ open. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
